      • augmentReIndexPage

        boolean augmentReIndexPage​(String pi,
                           int page,
                           org.apache.solr.common.SolrDocument doc,
                           String dataRepository,
                           String namingScheme)
                    throws Exception
        Any additional tasks this module needs to perform when re-indexing a page (e.g. putting additional files into the hotfolder).
        Parameters:
        pi - a String object.
        page - a int.
        doc - a SolrDocument object.
        dataRepository - a String object.
        namingScheme - a String object.
        Returns:
        true if successful; false otherwise
        Throws:
        Exception - if any.
